scripts.desktop:make:mac: npm run icons:build && npm run test && electron-forge make --platform=darwin
scripts.desktop:make:win: npm run icons:build && npm run test && electron-forge make --platform=win32
scripts.desktop:make:linux: npm run icons:build && npm run test && electron-forge make --platform=linux
scripts.test: npm run icons:build && tsc --noEmit && biome check . && npm run icons:check && openapi validate docs/requirements/GOOSE_SERVER_OPENAPI.json && vitest run && knip && dpdm --exit-code circular:1 --warning false --tree false "./src/**/*.{ts,tsx}" && jscpd --pattern "src/**/*.{ts,tsx}" --min-tokens 100 --threshold 3 --reporters console --absolute && vite build --config vite.server.config.ts && vite build --config vite.electron.main.config.ts && vite build --config vite.electron.preload.config.ts && vite build --config vite.electron.renderer.config.ts && sh -c 'if [ -z "${DISPLAY}${WAYLAND_DISPLAY}" ] && command -v xvfb-run >/dev/null 2>&1; then xvfb-run -a playwright test; else playwright test; fi'
